se.sics.assertionServer
Class AssertionServer

java.lang.Object
  se.sics.assertionServer.AssertionServer

public class AssertionServer
extends java.lang.Object

The base class of the assertion server. Provides attribute management and retrieval functions.

Author:
Ludwig Seitz

Constructor Detail

AssertionServer

public AssertionServer(DBConnector database,
                       AccessControlModule pdp,
                       AuthenticationModule auth,
                       java.lang.String privateKeyFile,
                       java.lang.String keyPassword,
                       java.util.List<java.security.cert.X509Certificate> rootCerts,
                       int defaultValidity)
                throws java.security.KeyStoreException,
                       java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                       java.security.cert.CertificateException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       java.security.UnrecoverableKeyException,
                       AssertionServerSchemaConfiguration.ConfigurationException,
                       javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
Constructor. Takes a database connector and an access control module.

Parameters:
database - the connector to the database storing the attribute information
pdp - the access control module that determines whether an request to the AssertionServer is granted
auth - the authentication module that is used to authenticate users
privateKeyFile - the file containing the private key used by this assertion server to sign assertions
keyPassword - the password for the private key file
rootCerts - the certificate(s) of the CA(s) that signed the assertion servers certificate
defaultValidity - the default validity in days for Assertions issued by this AssertionServer
Throws:
java.security.KeyStoreException
java.io.IOException
java.security.cert.CertificateException
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
java.security.UnrecoverableKeyException
AssertionServerSchemaConfiguration.ConfigurationException
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
Method Detail

connectUser

public RequestResult connectUser(se.sics.saml.SAMLID user,
                                 java.lang.Object authToken)
Connects a user to this assertion server by performing authentication.

Parameters:
user - the user's identifier
authToken - the authentication token used to authenticate the user
Returns:
the result of the connection request

disconnectUser

public void disconnectUser()
Disconnects the current user from this assertion server.

Create a new attribute definition.

Parameters:
newAttribute - the attribute definition
Returns:
a success or failure message

public RequestResult deleteAttribute(AttributeDefinition attribute)
Delete an attribute definition and all associated attributes.

Parameters:
attribute - the attribute definition
Returns:
a success or failure message

addAttributeValue

public RequestResult addAttributeValue(se.sics.saml.SAMLID subject,
                                       se.sics.saml.SAMLID soa,
                                       se.sics.saml.SAMLAttribute attribute)
Add a new attribute value. The attribute definition must exist.

Parameters:
subject - the identifier of the subject the attribute describes
soa - the source of authority for the attribute
attribute - the new attribute value
Returns:
a success or failure message

Parameters:

Returns:
a success or failure message

updateAttributeValue

public RequestResult updateAttributeValue(se.sics.saml.SAMLID subject,
                                          se.sics.saml.SAMLID soa,
                                          se.sics.saml.SAMLAttribute oldAttr,
                                          java.lang.String newAttrValue)
Update an attribute value.

Parameters:
subject - the identifier of the subject the attribute describes
soa - the source of authority for the attribute
oldAttr - the old attribute
newAttrValue - the new attribute value
Returns:
a success or failure message

Parameters:

Returns:
the result of the request
